sentence: The primary interests of the 35 progressive-leaning students granted the award in 2022 included environmental justice, menstrual equity,? transgender rights, Latinx political engagement, diversity and inclusion, intersectionality, gun control, and the gendered impacts of uranium mining.? title: Prestigious $30K federal scholarships doled out almost exclusively to progressive students
